title: Large T205 Lot w/ Many HOF's, SP's and Nice Mid-Grade **ANOTHER PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: Large T205 Lot w/ Many HOF's, SP's and Nice Mid-Grade **ANOTHER PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards available for sale or trade.  Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans.  Many nicer mid-grade cards in this lot.

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

Also, check out my graded T205 and T205 rarities/short print lots at:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=176549[/url]

and

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=178328[/url]


CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

H. McIntire - $21
Overall - $24
Parent - $15
Scott - $18

Hey Marc!  Mr. Wheat arrived today... very NICE!!!

thanks Again!

Cliff
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!

Three cheers for Marc, as four new cards for the Sovereign collection showed up today!

Always a pleasure to deal with!

Cheers,
Geno
One more bump for a price drop before I send these to eBay.  Thanks for looking!
Bump for another price drop.  Priced to clear out the rest of these!  Still some nice cards remaining.  Thanks for looking.
